mapper.select: SELECT BNUM, USERID, BTITLE, BCONTENT, BPICNAME, BDATE, BSUB FROM BOARDT WHERE BSUB=1 ORDER BY BNUM DESC LIMIT #{param1}, #{param2}
SELECT USERT.UNAME USERNAME, CONT.USERID USERID, CONT.CNUM CNUM, CONT.BNUM BNUM, CONT.CCONTENT CCONTENT, CONT.CDATE CDATE FROM CONT INNER JOIN USERT ON CONT.USERID=USERT.USERID ORDER BY CONT.CNUM ASC
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO BOARDT (USERID, BTITLE, BCONTENT, BPICNAME, BDATE, BSUB) VALUES ('admin', #{btitle},#{bcontent},#{bpicname},NOW(),1)
mapper.select: SELECT BNUM, USERID, BTITLE, BCONTENT, BPICNAME, BDATE, BSUB FROM BOARDT WHERE BSUB=1 AND BNUM = #{param1}
mapper.update: UPDATE BOARDT SET BTITLE=#{btitle}, BCONTENT =#{bcontent}, BPICNAME=#{bpicname}, BDATE=NOW() where BNUM=#{bnum};
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO CONT (BNUM, USERID, CCONTENT, CDATE) VALUES (#{param1},#{param2},#{param3},NOW())
mapper.select: SELECT USERT.UNAME USERNAME, CONT.USERID USERID, CONT.CNUM CNUM, CONT.BNUM BNUM, CONT.CCONTENT CCONTENT, DATE_FORMAT(CONT.CDATE,'%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s' ) CDATE FROM CONT INNER JOIN USERT ON CONT.USERID=USERT.USERID WHERE CONT.BNUM=#{param1} ORDER BY CONT.CDATE ASC
